snippet: The first balance sheet of Portugal's Novo Banco, the successor to Banco Espirito Santo following a state rescue in August, will show solvency ratios above the required threshold and no need for additional capital, its chief executive said....

headline.print_headline: Novo Banco CEO Sees No New Capital Need, Deposits Recovering
headline.main: Novo Banco CEO Sees No New Capital Need, Deposits Recovering

lead_paragraph: The first balance sheet of Portugal's Novo Banco, the successor to Banco Espirito Santo following a state rescue in August, will show solvency ratios above the required threshold and no need for additional capital, its chief executive said.
